lines.text: Are we not, please God a nation of very fierce bad rabbits.
You do trust me don't you? Yes, of course you do.
Remember that frightfully nice man who talked a lot about 'the classless society'? He had to go, of course, in the end.
Break him, Francis, bring him down. Break the lot of them.
He wants to be of use. He has a conscience. He wants to con-tri-bute.
You have a remarkable brain, and I should like to plunder it.
